content:
Well I am not sure if this is an error or what. I ran my development environment before and it worked fine, presently on running the command

/srv/zulip/tools/run-dev.py /srv/zulip/tools/run-dev.py --interface=''

I get the following in terminal. I dont see any error but my localhost on browser just doesnt load anything.

2016-09-22 08:08:35,126 INFO: Not in recovery; listening for FTS updates
done
http://localhost:9994/webpack-dev-server/
webpack result is served from http://127.0.0.1:9991/webpack/
content is served from /srv/zulip
./tools/../zerver/lib/actions.py:34: RemovedInDjango19Warning: django.utils.importlib will be removed in Django 1.9.
  from django.utils.importlib import import_module
Validating Django models.py...
System check identified no issues (0 silenced).

Django version 1.8
Tornado server is running at http://127.0.0.1:9993/
Quit the server with CTRL-C.
2016-09-22 08:08:36,962 INFO     Tornado loaded 0 event queues in 0.000s
2016-09-22 08:08:36,964 INFO     Tornado  98.4% busy over the past  0.0 seconds

webpack: bundle is now VALID.
Performing system checks...

System check identified no issues (0 silenced).
September 22, 2016 - 08:08:37
Django version 1.8, using settings 'zproject.settings'
Starting development server at http://127.0.0.1:9992/
Quit the server with CONTROL-C.
2016-09-22 08:08:39,367 INFO     launching queue worker thread error_reports
2016-09-22 08:08:39,368 INFO     launching queue worker thread user_presence
2016-09-22 08:08:39,369 INFO     launching queue worker thread digest_emails
2016-09-22 08:08:39,370 INFO     launching queue worker thread slow_queries
2016-09-22 08:08:39,374 INFO     launching queue worker thread missedmessage_mobile_notifications
2016-09-22 08:08:39,376 INFO     launching queue worker thread feedback_messages
2016-09-22 08:08:39,393 INFO     launching queue worker thread signups
2016-09-22 08:08:39,397 INFO     launching queue worker thread test
2016-09-22 08:08:39,405 INFO     launching queue worker thread message_sender
2016-09-22 08:08:39,514 INFO     launching queue worker thread missedmessage_emails
2016-09-22 08:08:39,519 INFO     launching queue worker thread email_mirror
2016-09-22 08:08:39,523 INFO     launching queue worker thread user_activity_interval
2016-09-22 08:08:39,525 INFO     launching queue worker thread invites
2016-09-22 08:08:39,533 INFO     launching queue worker thread user_activity
2016-09-22 08:13:36,975 INFO     Tornado removed 0 idle event queues owned by 0 users in 0.000s.  Now 0 active queues, 0 handlers, latest ID 0

browser just doesn't connect to the port http://127.0.0.1:9992/. Will be glad if someone could point out if there is some issue

Also, using vagrant provision now gives error as follows.

==> default: Running provisioner: shell...
    default: Running: inline script
==> default: ++ set -e
==> default: ++ set -o pipefail
==> default: ++ ln -nsf /srv/zulip /home/vagrant/zulip
==> default: ++ /usr/bin/python /srv/zulip/tools/provision.py
==> default: ++ sudo tee -a /var/log/zulip_provision.log
==> default: Get:1 http://ppa.launchpad.net trusty InRelease
==> default: Splitting up /var/lib/apt/lists/partial/ppa.launchpad.net_groonga_ppa_ubuntu_dists_trusty_InRelease into data and signature failed
==> default: Err http://ppa.launchpad.net trusty InRelease
==> default:   
==> default: Get:2 http://archive.ubuntu.com trusty InRelease
==> default: Splitting up /var/lib/apt/lists/partial/archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_trusty_InRelease into data and signature failed
==> default: Ign http://archive.ubuntu.com trusty InRelease
==> default: W: An error occurred during the signature verification. The repository is not updated and the previous index files will be used. GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net trusty InRelease: Clearsigned file isn't valid, got 'NODATA' (does the network require authentication?)
==> default: 
==> default: E: GPG error: http://archive.ubuntu.com trusty InRelease: Clearsigned file isn't valid, got 'NODATA' (does the network require authentication?)
==> default: Traceback (most recent call last):
==> default:   File "/srv/zulip/tools/provision.py", line 64, in <module>
==> default:     subprocess.check_call(["sudo", "apt-get", "update"])
==> default:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 540, in check_call
==> default:     raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd)
==> default: subprocess.CalledProcessError
==> default: : Command '['sudo', 'apt-get', 'update']' returned non-zero exit status 100
The SSH command responded with a non-zero exit status. Vagrant
assumes that this means the command failed. The output for this command
should be in the log above. Please read the output to determine what
went wrong.

@Sonali Gupta the provision issue is likely that you aren't using a proxy properly to connect to the public Internet.
The run-dev.py issue is likely that you need to connect to localhost:9991, not localhost:9992

Thanks @Tim Abbott , I was confused as the VagrantFile said 9991 and the terminal read development server at 9992. My bad. Well the environment is running. I need to look into this proxy problem but still thanks a lot
@Sonali Gupta BTW this stream is intended for help installing Zulip in production; use the "development help" stream for development server issues in the future.
